ABCD Definition: Pubertal Developmental Scale Parent (in abcd_ssphp01): Male Category pds_p_m_cat_sum (sum_p_m) = pds_bdyhair_y + pds_m4_p + pds_m5_p; 1 - prepuberty sum_p_m = 3; 2 - early puberty sum_p_m >= 4 and <= 5; 3 - mid puberty sum_p_m >= 6 and <= 8; 4 - late puberty sum_p_m >= 9 and <= 11; 5 - post puberty sum_p_m = 12; Validation: All items must be answered

Pubertal Developmental Scale Parent (in abcd_ssphp01): Female Category: pds_p_m_cat_sum (sum_p_f) = pds_2_p + pds_f4_p; 1 - prepuberty - sum_p_f = 2 and pds_f5_p = 1, 2 - early puberty - sum_p_f = 3 and pds_f5_p = 1, 3 - mid puberty - sum_p_f >= 3 and pds_f5_p = 1, 4 - late puberty - sum_p_f <= 7 and pds_f5_p = 4, 5 - post puberty - sum_p_f = 8 and pds_f5_p = 4; Validation: All items must be answered
